experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: DiscoverCareer aims to help everyone fulfil their unique potential. There are three parts to this mission:1. Help students and early professionals identify careers which match their talent, motivation and aspiration, increasing chances of success. We do this through a combination of our proprietary psychometric assessment for an objective evaluation and multiple hours of counseling with our experts to account for the subjective human element of a career decision.2. Help students and professionals explore promising career choices to convert a possible career from an abstract idea to an experience. We do this through our career activities and simulated internships.3. Help students and professionals develop skills and attributes that are most needed in the career of their choice. This is currently work in progress.

We do this through our career activities and simulated internships.3. Help students and professionals develop skills and attributes that are most needed in the career of their choice. This is currently work in progress.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Worked in the Financial Institutions Group within the Corporate Relations Group of Axis Bank. My work was on Trade Credit, specifically the impact of recent regulations on profitability and ease of operations on trade with China via Buyers' Credit.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Worked on analysis of Manganese Ore India Ltd (MOIL) following the release of their annual report. Also studied the general trends in the energy industry. Studied the US shale industry and modelled its influence on global oil supply and prices.
